Traits.Name: Wilding
Traits.Description: Immune to difficult and dangerous terrain.

Actions.Name: Wild Strike
Actions.Effect: Deal +[D] if character is in difficult or dangerous terrain.

Actions.Name: Vine Lash
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 must save or be shoved 4. On a successful save they are shoved 2. They take 1 piercing damage for every space they move through difficult terrain during this shove.

Actions.Name: Wild Growth
Actions.Description: Create a blast 1 area of difficult terrain. The difficult terrain provides cover for allies.
